Package ch.bailu.gtk.lib.handler.action

Class ActionHandler

java.lang.Object
ch.bailu.gtk.lib.handler.action.ActionHandler
public class ActionHandler extends Object
Manages application level ActionMap and offers Facade for Action Interface Callbacks for integer and boolean types actions
